title: Matplotlib Snapping Sliders
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use Matplotlib to create sliders with discrete values. You will learn how to constrain the values of a slider to a set of allowed values and snap the slider values to those allowed values.

meta.title: Mastering Matplotlib Snapping Sliders
meta.description: Learn how to create sliders with discrete values and snap them to allowed values using Matplotlib.
meta.keywords: python playground, matplotlib, python, data visualization, snapping, sliders, discrete values
